attributes.action: Protest that president Obama threatened the UK population into staying in the EU
attributes.background: Todays Blackmail speech conducted by the president of the USA. If we did not stay in the EU the USA would not trade with us and relegate us to its least preferential trading partner

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition which clearly outlines what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take. The content of speeches made by the President of the USA is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
